name: One-Eye
description:
This short visual novel is about a tree spirit named One-Eye who hears about a contest in the woods. Hopefully he gets a good ending.

This is the first of possibly many visual novels I'm making in the future. This game was made for the soul purpose of trying out a new program but ended up being something more. 

One-Eye is actually a character I saw in a dream a long time ago and developed his story as time went on, then inspired this visual novel. Even though I made the game by myself, I have my friends and family to thank for their support and advice.

I hope you enjoy One-Eye's story!
